H3.text: who owned the colts when they left baltimore. Irsay

A4.text: The franchise moved to Indianapolis in the middle of the night on March 29, 1984, under the threat of eminent domain from the city of Baltimore.

A5.text: Robert Irsay moved the franchise to Indianapolis.
